text: Ferenc Hemrik (25 August 1925 - 12 February 2007) was a Hungarian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Hungarian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Hungary Category:Ski jumpers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Ferenc Hemrik
